short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Start learning your first thousand Japanese words with unobtrusive hourly quizzes.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This is an app for anyone to take their first step towards learning japanese. Teaching the basic hiragana and katakana alphabets then teachings 1000 common words. The hour reminders will keep you engaged without consuming too much of your time, if you have an unstoppable desire to learn I have added a 30 minute timer (but don't put too much on your plate :).


Music by the ever-inventive UNKL_WYFU,
https://soundcloud.com/unkl_wyfu

The sparkle icon in the logo was made by Langtik and found on The Noun Project,
https://thenounproject.com/creator/langtik/
